name: Flip a Chip
description:
Flip a Chip is a very challenging puzzle game for all ages.

The goal is easy, get all chips with the white side upwards with as little as possible tap counts.

You need a good reasoning to get all puzzles done.

There are many several ways to get the puzzles solved.

--- Flip a Chip RULES ---

* The goal is to get all chips with the white side upwards

* If you tap on a chip, it and all it's neighbours (left, up, right, down) will flip
